modShortDescription: Hate all that inventory management? Not enough bag space or just like to carry around all the essentials just in case? Why not crunch it all into one tool?
modDescription:
Hate all that inventory management? Not enough bag space or just like to carry around all the essentials ‘just in case’? Why not crunch it all into one [tool](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/)? And by one, he mean three.

* AxePickShovel combo
* WrenchHammer combo (Left click for your wrenchy needs and right for upgrades) Pretty much what it already does.. but not.
* MacheteShears combo (Left click for stabby stab goodness while right for doing the lawn.)

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/theredwolf13/theredwolf13_Modlets/tree/master/theredwolf13_MultiTools)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18991-theredwolf13s-modlets/).

**Credits:** [theredwolf13](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/theredwolf13/)
